thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian and Penelope wear matching jackets | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian and Penelope wear matching jackets | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.Com
title: Kourtney Kardashian and Penelope wear matching jackets | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 202 shares Penelope's coat had a fur-lined collar and she wore a long, red and blue flannel underneath, while Kourtney's was unadorned at the neckline and she had on a black tee shirt. Mother and daughter: Kourtney and her little girl wore matching Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2's as they stepped out with the creator, himself Ladies in leather: The mother-daughter duo also both wore leather moto jackets and black pants for the outing The brains behind the Dash line also carried a black and red Louis Vuitton backpack, which could have belonged to her or little Penelope, who often sports a designer bag. Kourtney held her middle child's hand as they walked through the parking lot into their dining spot, soaking up the quality time. Penelope's cousin and best friend, North West, 3, was also there. Fancy in fur: Penelope's coat had a fur-lined collar and she wore a long, red and blue flannel underneath, while Kourtney's was unadorned at the neckline and she had on a black tee shirt Designer duds: The brains behind the Dash line carried a black and red Louis Vuitton backpack, which could have belonged to her or Penelope, who often sports a designer bag At one point, Kourtney held on to little North, who held Penelope's hand while Kim, 36, Kanye, 39, and Saint brought up the rear. North and her baby brother, Saint, 14 months, had their own matching looks going on, both wearing military green. Kim had on a black puffy jacket and coverd her face with large, black sunglasses while Kanye wore track pants and a white hooded sweatshirt for the family meal. Cousins and best friends: At one point, Kourtney held on to little North, who held Penelope's hand while Kim, 36, Kanye, 39, and Saint brought up the rear Share or comment on this article 202
